Class Relation

  • java.lang.Object
    • aa.Node

  • public class Relation
extends Node
    Class to represent the relations present in the input.

      • factTableLookup

        public boolean factTableLookup(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> claim)
        Lookup function for the fact table. This is an arity-oblivious method, a significant improvement over the collection of different arity-aware methods in earlier parts of the code. Input is a tuple of constants from the domain, returns true if this tuple is present in the fact table
        Parameters:
        claim - a tuple of constants (the claim to verify)
        Returns:
        true if this tuple is present in the fact table.
